member.name: M:Blade.BinaryMethods.PackTimestamp(System.Byte[]@,System.Int32,System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Serializes a basic primitive to raw bytes.
member.param: Backing buffer to write bytes to.
Where to start writing in the backing buffer.
Variable holding the primitive to serialize.

member.name: M:Blade.BinaryMethods.UnpackTimestamp(System.Byte[]@,System.Int32,System.DateTime@)
member.summary: Deserializes a basic primitive from raw bytes.
member.param: Backing buffer to read bytes from.
Where to start reading in the backing buffer.
Variable to store the resulting primitive in.

member.param: Backing buffer to write bytes to.

Variable holding the primitive to serialize.

member.summary: Deserializes a basic primitive from raw bytes.
member.param: Backing buffer to read bytes from.
Where to start reading in the backing buffer.
Variable to store the resulting primitive in.

member.name: M:Blade.BinaryMethods.BinaryCompare(System.Byte[],System.Byte[],System.UInt32,System.UInt32)
member.summary: Serializes a DateTime instance to raw bytes.
member.param: Backing buffer to store bytes in.
Where to start storing bytes in the backing buffer.
